## TinySynq.getChangesSinceLastSync() method

Returns [Change](./tinysynq-node.change.md) objects since the last local sync.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getChangesSinceLastSync(params?: {
        columns?: string[];
    }): Change[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | { columns?: string\[\]; } | _(Optional)_ Object containing retrieval parameters. |

**Returns:**

[Change](./tinysynq-node.change.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of [Change](./tinysynq-node.change.md) objects.

## Remarks

If `lastLocalSync` is empty, all changes are returned.
